sections.Situation: After finding a wounded bird on the ground Conan, Kogoro, and Ran hear a loud scream coming from the building next to them. Once upon entering the building they find a terrified woman in the hall, screaming about how she has just found her husband dead. The murder victim on the balcony, believed to have been killed by a plant pot.
sections.People:

- 55 years old

sections.Resolution: His motive for killing Imoto was that he shut down a fishing tackle shop he owned which the victim was going to renovate into company property. The last straw came when he rejected Terasawa's pleas and broke one of his precious fishing rods.
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Ryuusuke Imoto - Rob Monroe
- Takako Imoto - Tracy Monroe
- Tetsuo Dobashi - Dexter Reynolds
- Norio Terasawa - Nick Weldon
- In the Funimation Dub, the landlord of the building (Tsuji) is named Mr. Thompson.
sections.Trivia: - This episode features the first use of the show's fourth post-credits stinger image, featuring an unknown person looking at Conan through a magnifying glass.
